thread.title: Lions' littlest staff member steals Michele Tafoya's spotlight during 'Sunday Night Football'
thread.title_full: Lions' littlest staff member steals Michele Tafoya's spotlight during 'Sunday Night Football'

author: Hector Diaz
title: Lions' littlest staff member steals Michele Tafoya's spotlight during 'Sunday Night Football'
text:
Hello! 
Sunday night’s game between the Packers and Lions was some serious business. Yes, both teams had already punched their ticket to the postseason, but the victor would be the season’s NFC North division champ. 
And both teams treated the game with the earnestness it merited ... hey who’s that kid behind Michele Tafoya?
Excellent dance moves, little guy. And great job getting that tee after the kickoff. Where can we get a cool shirt like yours?
Thanks for also not endlessly dabbing while you were on camera, kid! Hope you had fun at the game!
